rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A welcoming entrance designed with Scandinavian minimalism and Vastu principles, ensuring positive energy flow.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Spacious living area with ample natural light and a north-facing window as per Vastu guidelines, integrated with modern Scandinavian furniture.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: A functional dining space adjoining the kitchen, designed to enhance family interactions.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern Scandinavian kitchen with efficient layout and Vastu recommendations for placement of cooking area in the south-east corner.

rooms.name: Bathroom (Ground Floor)
rooms.description: Primary bathroom with modern fixtures located near a service corridor to ensure privacy and easy maintenance.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: A guest bedroom ensuring comfort with minimalistic design, oriented towards the north as per Vastu guidelines for guest rooms.

openings.location: Between Living Room and Dining Area

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with a walk-in closet and an ensuite bathroom, ensuring privacy and comfort with Scandinavian design.

rooms.name: En-suite Bathroom (Master Bedroom)
rooms.description: Modern en-suite bathroom designed for convenience and functionality.

rooms.name: Home Office
rooms.description: Dedicated home office with a quiet environment, north-facing window per Vastu guidelines to enhance productivity and mental clarity.

rooms.name: Balcony (Connected to Master Bedroom)
rooms.description: A private balcony offering serene views, incorporating Scandinavian aesthetics with natural materials.

openings.location: Between Ground Floor and First Floor
Between Home Office and Master Bedroom

openings.description: Large open area with pergola for outdoor seating and greenery

levels.description: A spacious rooftop terrace designed as an extension of the living space, ideal for relaxation and gatherings. Incorporates Scandinavian design principles and Vastu guidelines by ensuring clear sightlines to the north and east.
